SEARCH
Package my.uum

Class DatabaseManager

java.lang.Object
my.uum.DatabaseManager
public class DatabaseManager extends Object
This class is to handle all database interactions. This uses JDBC-SQLite

    • login

      public String login(String loginStaffID, String loginPassword)
      The system admin need to provide loginStaffID and loginPassword to log in the system.
      Parameters:
      loginStaffID - System Admin need to fill in his/her staff if for login.
      loginPassword - System Admin need to fill in his/her password for login.
      Returns:
      Display the message.

    • displayApprovedAdmin

      public String displayApprovedAdmin()
      Get the details of the school admin that the status is "pending" and waiting to approve.
      Returns:
      Display the list of school admin which the status is "pending".

    • checkAdminPin

      public String checkAdminPin(String loginStaffID, String pin)
      The System Admin need to provide his/her specific PIN continue to approve the school admin.
      Parameters:
      loginStaffID - The staff id is taken to detect before approve the school admin.
      pin - The PIN is taken to detect before approve the school admin.
      Returns:
      Display the result.

    • updateStatusSchoolAdmin

      public void updateStatusSchoolAdmin(String schoolStaffID)
      Update the status of the school admin that already be approved.
      Parameters:
      schoolStaffID - The staff if of school admin that the system admin choose to change the status to approve.

    • insertUser

      public String[] insertUser(String User_ID, String ICNO, String User_Name, String Mobile_TelNo, String Email, String pin)
      Insert the user information entered by the user and save it into the database.
      Parameters:
      User_ID - Users need to fill in their user id for their information.
      ICNO - Users need to fill in their IC number for their information.
      User_Name - Users need to fill in their name for their information.
      Mobile_TelNo - Users need to fill in their phone number for their information.
      Email - Users need to fill in their email for their information.
      pin - PIN will be generate after the user register.
      Returns:
      Display the result.

    • insertBooking

      public void insertBooking(String Booking_ID, String Room_ID, String User_ID, String Purpose_of_booking, String Booking_Time, String Booking_Date, String pin)
      Insert the booking details entered by the user and save them into the database.
      Parameters:
      Booking_ID -
      Room_ID - Users need to choose the room id that they want to book.
      User_ID - Users need to give their user id to know who is booking the room.
      Purpose_of_booking - Users need to give the purpose for booking the room.
      Booking_Time - Users need to give time to book the room.
      Booking_Date - Users need to give a date to book the room.
      pin - Users need to enter the PIN to continue booking.

    • displayRoomID

      public String displayRoomID()
      Display the meeting room that can be booked which the status = 'Ready'.
      Returns:
      Display the result.

    • updateStatus

      public void updateStatus(String Room_ID)
      Update the meeting room status to 'Reserved' when the user successfully books the meeting room.
      Parameters:
      Room_ID - The room id that the users choose to change the status.

    • insertAdmin

      public String[] insertAdmin(String Staff_ID, String Staff_Name, String Staff_Mobile_TelNo, String Staff_Email, String password, String School_ID, String status, String pin)
      Insert the information of School Admin into table School_Admin
      Parameters:
      Staff_ID - Staff ID.
      Staff_Name - The name of the staff.
      Staff_Mobile_TelNo - The phone number of the staff.
      Staff_Email - The email address of the staff.
      password - Password.
      School_ID - The school ID of the staff.
      status - The status of the account (pending/apporve).
      pin - The auto generated access pin.
      Returns:
      The array of the School Admin information.

    • insertRoom

      public String[] insertRoom(String Room_ID, String Room_Description, String Maximum_Capacity, String Status, String Room_TypeID, String School_ID)
      Add a new room information
      Parameters:
      Room_ID - Room_ID.
      Room_Description - The description of the Room.
      Maximum_Capacity - The maximum capacity of the Room.
      Status - The status of the room (Reserved/Available).
      Room_TypeID - The Room Type ID of the room.
      School_ID - The School ID of the room.
      Returns:
      The array of the room information.

    • GeneratePin

      public String GeneratePin()

      Returns:
      6 digit pin number.

    • displayUserList

      public String displayUserList(String Room_ID, String Room_Description, String Maximum_Capacity, String Booking_Date, String Booking_Time)
      Get the list of users and the details of the room that had been booking.
      Parameters:
      Room_ID - Room ID is shown in the list after booking the room.
      Room_Description - Room description is shown in the list after booking the room.
      Maximum_Capacity - Maximum capacity of the room is shown in the list after booking the room.
      Booking_Date - Booking date is shown in the list after booking the room.
      Booking_Time - Booking time is shown in the list after booking the room.
      Returns:
      Display list of users and their room information that had been booking.

    • displayAvailableRooms

      public String displayAvailableRooms()
      Get the details of available booking room from the system.
      Returns:
      Display the list of room and the room's details that available to booking.

    • deleteOldBookings

      public void deleteOldBookings()
      Delete the booking details from the database while thW data is more than a week.
